TEXT.TITLE: VALEX PETROLEUM <VALP> RECLASSIFIES DEBT
TEXT.BODY: Valex Petroleum Inc said its 1.3 mln dlrs in long-term debt with a commercial bank was reclassified as a current liability, which resulted in its auditors giving it a qualified opinion. Earlier, Valex reported a net loss 219,632 for 1986. Reuter
